sentences.sContent: They were all drinking lethal amounts of tequila!
sentences.sCn: 他们都在不要命地喝特奎拉酒！

sentences.sContent: Higher taxes and higher inflation were a lethal combination.
sentences.sCn: 重税加上高通货膨胀真是让人没法活了。

phrases.pCn: n. 致命性注射剂；注射处死

remMethod.val: leth(死， 僵) + al → 致命的

trans.tranCn: 致命的； 破坏性极大的， 极其有害的
trans.tranOther: likely to be powerful or dangerous – often used humorously
